meanings.sent1: The ganevs were caught red-handed by the police.

meanings.definition: Ganevs (verb): to steal or commit theft
meanings.sent1: He ganevs money from unsuspecting victims on the street.
meanings.sent2: Criminals often ganevs valuable items to make quick money.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous raccoon ganevs shiny objects from the campsite.
meanings.sent4: Time seemed to ganevs away as she lost herself in the book.
meanings.sent5: The thief skillfully ganevs the priceless painting from the museum.
